com.flipfit.exception

Packages that use com.flipfit.exception
Package
Description
com.flipfit.business
 
com.flipfit.dao
 
  • Classes in com.flipfit.exception used by com.flipfit.business
    Class
    Description
    AccessDeniedException
    Custom exception to be thrown when a user attempts to access a resource or perform an action for which they do not have the necessary permissions.
    AuthenticationException
    Custom exception to be thrown when a user's authentication credentials (e.g., username, password) are invalid or incorrect.
    DuplicateEntryException
    Custom exception to be thrown when an attempt is made to create a duplicate entry.
    MismatchinputException
    Thrown when user input does not conform to the expected format or type.
    MissingValueException
    Thrown when an expected value is null or missing.
    UnableToDeleteUserException
    Thrown when an attempt to delete a user and its related data fails.
